abstrac: “Ensuring Success from the Start” || Clean + Modern + Unique = Our work ||
bio:
We at Dynamic-Methods are a software-based company in India. We bring 15+ years of expertise in website and mobile technology to the table, and our in-house team of 25+ top-notch experts are skilled in all the latest tools, technologies, and frameworks.

We have Excellent Skills in iOS, Android, HTML/HTML 5, CSS/CSS3, MySQL, Ajax, Bootstrap, Core PHP, jQuery, JavaScript, React, ASP.NET, Node JS, Angular JS, WordPress, Magneto, Laravel, Codeigniter, Drupal, Python, Shopify, Joomla, Zend, E-commerce, Woocommerce, CMS Website development, Mobile Apps, etc. technologies & framework, therefore, we ensure the quality delivery of product with our experiences in Mobile app and web development over the past few years.

We are Expertise in providing services including the following:

        • Mobile App Development
        • Software Development
        • Web Development
        • E-Commerce Development
        • Web Designing (UI/UX)
        • App Designing (UI/UX)
        • IoT Development
        • Social Media & Third Party API Integration
        • Testing Services
        • Payment Gateway Integration
        • MySQL, SQL Lite, PostgreSQL & Mongo Database Programming


We are providing solutions for various industries such as 
        
        • Real Estate
        • Healthcare
        • eCommerce
        • Restaurant & Food Delivery
        • Business & Social Networking
        • Travel and Hospitality
        • Media and Entertainment
        • Education and eLearning
        • Banking and Financials
   
Success is the name of the game and we play to win! We keep the lines of communication open and check in regularly to ensure your project hits the bullseye.

Unleash the Power of Technology with Dynamic Methods: Transform Your Business Today with Our Expertise in Mobile and Web Development Services.

"Your success is our success - let's make it happen!"

Why choose us :
-Project Planning and Sprint Development. 
-Unlimited revisions in design. 
-Testing and QA. 
-Responsive for mobile/tablets/desktop and fully compatible software applications. 
-Error free & clean codes. 
-Fully SEO Friendly. 
-Easy to use and navigate, you will easily add/edit the content. 
-Free of cost Deployment.
-Each client is assigned a dedicated project management team.
-Client preferences are documented for complete knowledge transfer across work shifts.
-Support: 24X7 available for support.
-Post Deployment support for 12 months Free of cost (Bug fixing).

We ensure service guarantee :-
-24*7 hours live support. 
-Free of cost technical support for lifetime. 
-Satisfaction guarantees otherwise we will refund. 
-No charges for deployment.

Additional Benefits :  
-Extensive Quality Check & Testing. 
-Documentation and Suggestions for improvements.
-Support and Maintenance with quick turnaround time.
-Discounted price for long term
-Realistic cost of the project
-Future proof and secure development with advance technology

bio:
I can provide IT Infrastructure Management services, Monitoring tools development, Unix and Windows Administration services, Remote IT Infrastructure Management(RIM), VMWare Cloud services, Data Center services.

Total 23 years of rich IT Infrastructure management space.

Expertise in IT Infrastructure monitoring tools such as Zabbix, Nagios, Opsview, SolarWinds (NPM, SAM and APM), AppDynamics (APM), ManageEngine, Splunk, Datadog, Graphite, Grafana, IBM Tivoli, Netcool, VMWare vRealize Operation Manager(cROps), HP OpenView tools, CA Spectrum, Logstash, MS System Center Operation Manager and other monitoring tools.

Expert in developing custom monitoring tools such as Event Forwarder/Event Filtering/Event Enrichment/Event Correlation/Alert Management/Alert Blackout and Brownout, Alert Noise reduction, reducing the alerts and tickets using event correlation rules, Integrating the MOM with AIOps tools such as Splunk.

Good exposure to VMWARE vSphere, ESXi Cluster, vCenter, and vRealize Operations, AWS cloud and Azure Cloud.

Expertise in Linux administration and Windows server administration.

Expertise in Server backup and database backup using Tivoli Storage Manager.

Expertise in Job scheduling tool Tivoli Workload Scheduler (Maestro).

Solid understanding of technologies in IT Infrastructure Service Delivery and IT Infrastructure Operations (Servers, Networking, Storage, Virtualization, AWS/Cloud, vSphere Cloud, Remote Infrastructure Management and monitoring tools & automation technologies).

Excellent exposure to Incident Management, Change Management, Availability Management, Capacity Management, Release & Deployment Management.

Prepare high level design, detailed design and technical IT Infrastructure architecture for deployment & document the same.

Excellent exposure to Help Desk and Change management Systems integration with Event Management tools – Integration of Remedy, Peregrine Service Center and ServiceNow etc.

I can work in 24/7 environment.
I am based out of Hyderabad, India. Available on Skype, email or phone or Onsite (if Business Visa is sponsored).

I always work hard to find new ways of techniques to help the company and be more efficient as I can be in this career.

bio: We have enough experience by completing websites like www.rebornthegame.com, www.jmjfinancial.com, www.deathtennis.com, www.myzenergy.co.uk, www.shawsupply.com, www.nycwinereport.com, www.staceyleeagency.com, www.nobullies.net, www.fixremotely.com and few others. We can provide a completed website list and our satisfied clients for reference from US, UK and Australia. We believe that our work will speak about us and we don't hesitate to start relationship with a small assignment and then grow step by step.Right now we are taking projects in custom PHP (Mysql), .NET (MS SQL Server), Java, Ruby on Rails, FileMaker and Flash technology. Please contact us to know further about our technology standards and programming standards that we follow.Please don't hesitate to ask quality proposals which will explain feature and its implementation, solution architecture, examples and references, break-up costs, payment plan, and assumptions. We would also provide a clear list that what will be covere

Any fixed cost project work should begin with clear scope of work and upfront clarity can be achieved through discussion, PSD and supporting documents. Please don't award work to us until you get a clarity that what you will get at the project end, it can be in a form of PSD and annotations for each feature, a word document with explanation of implementation of feature, clear modules and deliverable and payment plan. We will always be ready to do the discussion and prepare Graphics and initial PSD or html design however we prefer to have PSD ready at beginning of discussion. Please don't start any project until you can give at least 5-10 hours in project discussion and design phase. Project fails in general due to ambiguity of feature needed and how it should be implemented.We also take work on monthly professional retainer basis. You have to put money in escrow at beginning of month and release at end of month.You have to put full project money in escrow and you have to release escrow

abstrac: PROOFREADING and EDITING Exceptional Quality and Accuracy at a Great Price! EMAIL: ccalzone58@yahoo.com
bio:
PROOFREADING and EDITING: $8.50 per 1,000 words

NOW OFFERING 10,000 WORDS OR LESS EDITING FOR $75.00**
15,000 WORD EDITING for $100.00**

(APPLICABLE ONLY WHEN DOING A MULTI-BOOK SERIES. Rewording/minimal content writing only).

45+ years in the proofreading/copy editing field. Excellent grammar and knowledge of legal ease. My services include proofreading & editing, grammar & punctuation, minimal content writing if needed, continuity, and readability. I know you will be satisfied with my work.

Each and every word personally read. No proofreading or editing programs are used until after I have read the entire document or manuscript. I use Grammarly Premium to double-check my own work.

Please check out my profile with GURU.com for experience, talent, and the testimonials customers have given me. I have proofread and edited 16 children's books, one of which is a continuing series, proofread and edited multiple research papers and dissertations, personal statements, editing and content writing for multiple websites, 11 novels/bios of a Christian nature, a continuing e-book novel series, multiple books on healthy eating, weight training, and weight loss, many self-help and motivational books, business-based books, graphic novel comic series (ongoing), plus multiple novels of various genres such as romance, sci-fi, mystery, and fantasy. I presently work with six best-selling authors and have many customers who have already been published. I also work for a publisher based in Chicago who uses me for his "difficult clients" because of my prowess in editing and ability to meet tight time constraints.

Jorge Armenteros (published author review 08-19-21)

"Hi, Cindy,

I just finished going over your edits. You have done an excellent job! You have polished the manuscript in so many ways. Your attention to detail and your understanding of my intentions make the manuscript shine. The manuscript is happy and I am happy as well.

With sincere gratitude,
Jorge"

HOURS: Monday thru Friday 9:00 am to 7:00 PM EST. Saturday and Sunday on an as-needed basis. Prices depend on the difficulty and length of the project.

PRICE CHANGE EFFECTIVE JANUARY, 2021
Proofreading and editing pricing begins at $8.50 per thousand words, a minimum charge of $42.50. My hourly fee is $42.50 per hour.

Resume package - 2-page resume with cover letter is $75.00. Add'l pages in resume/CV are 15.00 each.

NOW OFFERING PDF EDITING without changing document over to WORD DOCUMENT. Often times when converting, a PDF loses format and information in the conversion. I now have the capability of editing a PDF without conversion. NEED TO SEE DOCUMENT FIRST, especially ONLINE APPLICATIONS OR ANYTHING INVOLVING CHECKABLE BOXES before a quote is given.

Prices are always negotiable after a quote is given.

bio:
My name is Sarmad Riaz, and I am a technical support and QA engineer. I have been providing technical software support and Quality assurance services to different companies for several years. 
My key responsibilities include assisting customers requesting support with our software and services and providing them feasible solutions, communicating troubleshooting steps to clients in a timely and professional manner. Creating knowledge based articles, documenting solutions to frequently asked questions and problems to assist the clients promptly. Managing multiple cases in queue, inbound and outbound communications, carrying out research into problems in multiple databases and forums to find issues and solutions. Replicating customer issues using personal computers or cloud resources. Supporting users and network administrators over the telephone and by email. Managing a team of employees from different countries including India, Czech Republic, Serbia, and USA. I was promoted for excellent services from executive to Technical Support Engineer within a year. 
I have IT Proficiency in the following areas : 
  1) Server Administration
  2) Linux, Centos Ubuntu.
  3) FreeBSD and Mac
  4) Microsoft Windows Server 2003 and up
  5) MySQL Post Gre SQL
  6) Microsoft SQL Server 2016+
  7) Apache/Nginx.
  8) Microsoft IIS
  9) Cloud computing, experience with Amazon AWS and Azure
  10) Systems and application monitoring and management   
11) Networking protocols TCP/IP, DNS, RDP, SSH HTTP and HTTPS
12) Experienced in using help desk application like: Zendesk, SalesForce, HelpScout, Intercom. 
13) Experienced in using Jira.
14) Experienced in writing test cases in Jira using the add-on Zypher, also experienced in test rail and Qase. 
15) Experienced writing functional / non-functional test cases 
16) Experienced in building test suites from scratch. 
17) Asana - Project management 
18) Ring Central soft phones 
19) InContact 
20) G-Suite - Google workspace

abstrac: Reliable, Experienced Senior Developer to make you 100% satisfied!
bio:
Dedicated, passionate, and accomplished Full Stack Developer with 12+ years of progressive experience working as an Independent Contractor.

I've acquired a wide depth of knowledge and expertise in using my technical skills in programming, computer science, software development, and mobile app development to developing solutions to help organizations increase productivity, and accelerate business performance.

There's always something new to learn, especially in IT-related fields. People like working with me because I can explain technology to everyone, from staff to executives who need me to tie together the details and the big picture. I can also implement the technologies that successful projects need.

Set myself apart from other developers by adhering to software industry best practices, that saves time, money and reputation in the long term. Some of these practices include version control, backups and properly documented code.
